This is the station closest to Reitaku University. There really is nothing special about it, but it stands out in my memory as the first station I use regularly for my first job in Japan.
DISCOVERY 初めて行った場所、自分を変えた旅、感動した景色。

I first attempted a climb when I was in elementary school. I got to 8th station, but then was unable to go any further. My father and brother went on without me, leaving me there by myself. I cried and cried, waiting for their return that seemingly never came. The ojisan there held me in his arms, assuring me that they would come down soon, all the way looking up the hill seeking their descent. Eventually we were reunited. A few years later, I climbed the mountain again, finally making it to the top.
NOSTALGIA 子供の頃の遊び場、旧校舎、忘れられない家族旅行など。

Whenever I have visitors from abroad, we meet here, at the quad that faces the imperial palace. We then head out in that direction and enjoy the walk that goes around the palace, with them most sandwiched between us. Oftentimes, we see newlyweds taking photographs with the palace as their background.
NOSTALGIA 子供の頃の遊び場、旧校舎、忘れられない家族旅行など。

I really wanted to go a US college straight out of high school in the 90s. But my father would tell me that I needed to know my roots, and forced me to choose a Japanese university. With only a few options at the time that accepted kikokushijo (returnee) students from abroad, this is where I ended up. While I complained non-stop about how I disliked pretty much everything about how the Japanese society functioned, it turns out that this was a truly informing and enjoyable time of my life, thanks to the many friends I made here, and the perfect "vibe" the school offered, a perfect blend of local and global perspectives, inakamono's mixed in with international students from all over the world.
NOSTALGIA 子供の頃の遊び場、旧校舎、忘れられない家族旅行など。

When I was in college, Kichijouji was the place to go to hang out, and have an oshare date. It had it all. Retro spots, modern hot spots, a huge park for a romantic stroll, Thai restaurants, shopping, and Sun road.

ゲームイベントでも同じゲーム友達ができてとても楽しかった！

1人で初めて日帰り旅行に行った場所で、アニメの聖地になってる所でいつか行ってみたかったところだったからとても思い出に残ってる。江ノ電にも乗れたし、七里ヶ浜という海岸に行って浸ったりして日帰り温泉にも入って充実した一日だった。
DISCOVERY 初めて行った場所、自分を変えた旅、感動した景色。

友達と初めてライブを見に行った場所。
静岡に一人で行くのも初めてだったので何もかもが新鮮でとても楽しかった。
台風の影響で電車などが遅延してしまいライブが終わった後も音響担当や照明担当のスタッフたちが盛り上げてくれて最高の思い出となった。
DISCOVERY 初めて行った場所、自分を変えた旅、感動した景色。
